title: Price updated! FS : Large EPDG and Sov 350 Collection Part 4 (Final)
author: DougG423

posts.post_title: Price updated! FS : Large EPDG and Sov 350 Collection Part 4 (Final)
posts.post_content:
Proud to offer these El Principe de Gales and Sov 350 subjects

Jim McGinley Sov 350 SGC 1 $90
Jimmy Jackson Sov 350 SGC 3.5 Only 8 higher $225
Joe Kelley Sov 350 SGC 1.5 SOLD
Larry Mclean EPDG SGC 5 Only 2 higher $875
Lee Quillen Sov 350 SGC 4 Only 8 higher $275

There's a little bit for everyone. Discount for multiple subjects. Always happy to entertain offers. They're more in this back collection. Let me know if you're looking for a certain subject. I have sold on FB T206 groups and CL.

Price includes USPS Priority box and insurance
PPFF, PPGS and Zelle
Added Zelle as payment. Thanks to everyone that's bought a cards!
